DOC.brief_summary: The investigator develop diagnostic test evaluation presence fetal malformation metabolomic analysis maternal peripheral blood serum chromatographic technique mass spectrometry , subsequent mathematical modeling analysis data mean multivariate mathematical model specifically develop purpose . The study aim determine performance parameter ( specificity , sensibility , positive predictive value ( PPN ) , negative predictive value ( NPV ) , etc . ) test applicability . To , investigator use serum sample patient enrol New Zealand SCOPE Study ( www.scopestudy.net ) , international study conduct year 2004-2008 .
DOC.detailed_description: The test develop case-control study . In clinical trial investigator test large cohort likely resemble real population . The purpose validation see test able recognize malformed fetus entire population especially specificity real condition . In addition , investigator check whether particular maternal condition ( preeclampsia , gestational diabetes , etc . ) fetal condition ( Small gestational age , Large gestational age , etc . ) affect test result .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion one design SCOPE Study : Nulliparous woman , singleton pregnancy , 14wks , 0 day 16wks , 6 day gestation give inform consent participate SCOPE . Exclusion criterion one design SCOPE Study : Unsure last menstrual period ( LMP ) Unwilling ultrasound scan ≤20 week ≥3 miscarriage ≥3 termination Essential hypertension treat prepregnancy Moderatesevere hypertension book ≥160/100 mmHg Diabetes Renal disease Systemic lupus erythematosus Antiphospholipid syndrome Sickle cell disease HIV positive Major uterine anomaly Cervical suture Knife cone biopsy Ruptured membrane Long term steroid Treatment lowdose aspirin Treatment calcium ( > 1g/24h ) Treatment eicosapentanoic acid ( fish oil ) Treatment vitamin C ≥1000 mg & Vit E ≥400 iu Treatment heparin/low molecular weight heparin
